thread.title: Mona Gazala, Second Sight Project
thread.title_full: Words Anywhere reviewed by Mona Gazala, Second Sight Project

author: Mona Gazala, Second Sight Project
title: Mona Gazala, Second Sight Project
text: As a gallerist and a text-based artist, I have used Words Anywhere for a few years on projects ranging from gallery signage to using text as a part of my sculpture work. I have been 100% satisfied with their product and timely service. My only suggestion would be to add more color choices in the future (my personal preference being for a greater variety of grays or neutral tones).
